item.description:
Please join me for a drink on the roof deck at the Rattlesnake Bar & Grill.

I'll get there between 5:30pm (ish) / 5:45pm (ish) and I'll stay for a couple of hours, but feel free to come and go as you please.

There will be no group tab because people will be arriving and leaving at different times. Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go.

This place often gets crowded, loud and hot. So, please, no hate mail afterwards because you've been warned. :-)

This is on ... rain or shine. If it's raining, we'll stay inside.

Check out the Rattlesnake's website for more info:

http://www.rattlesnak...

I'll wear a GREEN shirt. I'm asking everyone who attends to wear something GREEN too!

It'll be easier to find us if everyone wears the color GREEN!!!

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a GREEN shirt! I'm asking everyone to wear something GREEN too. So, look for a group of people wearing GREEN!!!
item.why: To have a drink on a roof deck on a hot, sizzling summer night in GREEN clothing!
item.name: Roof Deck at Rattlesnake Bar & Grill - Wear GREEN!!!
